description: This is a continuation of KORN 111. The second course expands student's competence by dealing with more functions in varous contexts that students can frequently encounter in every day interactions. In order to prepare students for social contexts, students are encouraged to engage in conversations by personalizing the topics, functions or contexts. Students will perform in an interpersonal way by providing and obtaining information, expressing feelings and emotions, and exchanging opinions on a variety of topics such as birthday parties, recreation and hobbies, Korean holidays, marriage, cultural differences, education and jobs.
name: INTERMEDIATE KOREAN II: Korean Summer Language Institute
